Summary: I seen 11-13 of the beings, the ship was very big and there was a white light beam.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Kingsland
There were no other sightings in Kingsland on or around June 1st 1995
divs: sighting detailsi don't remember the exact date or month. what i do know is it was around summer time and i was 11 years old. i woke up on the loveseat and my dog wanted to go outside. it was about 2am in the morning. i opened the sliding glass door to let her out. i was half awake and i told her to go out. she just sat there sniffing the air. i then looked up and seen the ufo. it was big, cover my whole back yard, house and most of the trees. it was about 2 inches from touching the roof and tree tops. the ufo was the color of an old penny. the top of the ship was oval shape, the bottom was triangle. in the 3 corners of the triangle was 1 dim red light. i just looked at it and froze. i wanted to yell for my parents and i couldn't. i wanted to follow it as it started to drift away slowly over the trees into the woods. yet, i couldn't move. i just shut the sliding glass door. walked back towards the loveseat and realized it was almost 3 something in the morning. i layed on the couch and went back to sleep. the next morning i told my parents and they listened and that was it. i never gave it any more thought. that was until a few years ago. i started having nightmare and remembered that night. what i remember from my nightmares is only some of the puzzel. i remember 11-13 beings, they are about knee\waist height. i didn't see there skin color or body shape. i only seen there glowing yellow eyes. they was in a horizontal line, walking together through the edge of the woods in my backyard towards my house. i was locked outside my house. i couldn't get the sliding glass door open. i was very scared, so i ran towards the front of the house to try the front door. i got halfway there and a white light hit me and i froze and was on the ground. i remember being surrounded at this point but i didn't see the faces or arms nothing. but i was surrounded. this is as far as the story goes. i don't remember anymore. i always questioned god why did this happen to me, i was only 11 years old. i thought about doing hynoises but part of me is scared too. what if they think i am crazy and where does one go to get this done and why good will it do if nothing is done about it? what do you suggest? one other thing that maybe a clue. a few months after this happen i did have an out of body experiance\astral projection. never had it happen again in my life. any answers or maybe a chat with others to discuss this..something..
